subject: [Radiance-general] trans or glass material, rectangular luminousopening problem
body:
Gregory J. Ward wrote:



Christian, are you referring to the appearance of the illuminance patch
on a surface near the source, or rather the apparent brightness of the
source polygon?  If the former, this could be the result of having -ds
set too low.

- Rob Guglielmetti
www.rumblestrip.org
